name: Unity-Mart
description1: This is a full Stack Multi-vendor E-commerce web site with responsive.
description2: User and admin has different permission here. User/Admin must have register/login.
description3: Users can order any product,see/delete their order, give review. They can also perticipate in Affiliate marketing
description4: Vendors can create their own profile and sell their product.
description5: Admin can add another admin & product, approve order, delete order
technology: HTML,CSS,React js,React router, Redux, Typescript, Tailwind, Material UI MongoDB, Firebase, Node, Font Awesome, Heroku, Github

description1: This is a full Stack web site with responsive.

description5: Admin can add another admin & product, delete/approve order, delete order
technology: HTML,CSS,Bootstrap,React js,React router,React hook form,MongoDB,Firebase,Node, Font Awesome,Heroku,Github

name: NIRAPOD TRAVELS

description2: But here user and admin are same.
description3: Both of them must have login
description4: User can order any service and see their order
technology: HTML,CSS,Bootstrap,React js,React router,React hook form,MongoDB,Firebase,Node, Font Awesome,Heroku,Github
